tool_description: Provides final edibility confirmation for identified species, cross-referencing multiple databases and safety protocols before consumption approval.

preparation_method.description: Intended preparation: raw, cooked, dried, tea

error_messages: Insufficient identification confidence: Confidence below minimum threshold - do not consume
High toxicity risk: Toxicity assessment indicates unsafe for consumption
Dangerous lookalikes present: Cannot confirm edibility due to lookalike risks
Unknown species: Species not in edibility database for this region
Expert consultation required: Species requires professional verification before consumption
usage: Input species_name with identification_confidence, toxicity_assessment, and lookalike_warnings from previous tools. System provides final edibility decision.

edibility_rating.description: Edibility classification: excellent, good, fair, poor, inedible
